players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked and saddened by Charlie's sudden demise. Let's all remain vigilant and work together to find out who did this."
Diana: "Bob, I think we should investigate Alice further. They seemed suspicious last night."
You: "I have nothing to hide and am confident that I had no involvement in Charlie's death. Let us focus on finding the real killer instead of making baseless accusations."
Bob: "I think we should focus on gathering more information before making any accusations. Let's discuss the events of last night and see if anyone noticed anything unusual."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
